fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player each full moon.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Detection Immune
- If you have killed at least one player, you may attack each night instead.
- If you have killed at least two players, your attack rampages.
- If you have killed at least three players, your attack is Unstoppable and you ignore all protective effects.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
